NK036(chi)025:1: // bla ma rgyal ba zhang chen po'i rnam par thar pa bzhugs so //
NK036(chi)025:2: brjod bral stong pa'i klong dkyil nas //
NK036(chi)025:4: thugs rjes sprul pa'i brgyud 'dzin pa //
NK036(chi)025:5: bla ma mchog la gus phyag 'tshal //
NK036(chi)025:6: bla ma rgyal ba zhang chen po 'di nyid //
NK036(chi)025:7: yul yar 'brog sgang gi sgrub mtsho gling dgu bla
NK036(chi)025:8: do zhes bya bar yab zhang sras rdo rje dngos
NK036(chi)025:9: grub dang / yum zhu mo nye re lcam gnyis
NK036(chi)025:10: kyi sras mtshan brjod par dka' ba'i bkra shis rdo
NK036(chi)025:12: dgung lo bcu gcig phan chad yum gyi rtsar bzhugs nas /
NK036(chi)025:13: de nas yum de sdang bas a ne ma jo
NK036(chi)025:14: zhig gi rtsar ring du khrid nas phyin pa'i dus
NK036(chi)025:15: su bla ma lce sgom nag po dang mjal ba'i
NK036(chi)025:16: dus / bla ma dgyes nas 'di la sangs rgyas
NK036(chi)025:17: kyi sprul pa gcig 'ongs pa yin pas 'di nga
NK036(chi)025:18: la phul dang gsungs nas khong gi spyan sngar lo
NK036(chi)025:19: dus / gcig bzhugs / de nas chos kyi rgya
NK036(chi)025:20: mtsho chen por shes rab kyi pad+ma rgyas par 'khrungs
NK036(chi)025:21: dus / gcig bzhugs / pas / 'dul ba mdo
NK036(chi)025:22: sde dbu tshad gsan pa dang sngags gsar rnying gi
NK036(chi)025:23: bla ma mkhas shing grub pa thob pa'i khyad 'phags
NK036(chi)025:24: kyi bla ma bcu gsum bsten nas /
NK036(chi)025:26: dgung lo nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar la thoos bsam mdzad do //
NK036(chi)025:27: de nas nyang stod sna khu yul na bzhugs pa'i dus /
NK036(chi)025:28: tho rengs sgra chen po gcig grags te /
NK036(chi)025:29: bzhengs nas gzigs pas nam mkha' 'ja' dang 'od du 'khrugs pa'i dkyil na /
NK036(chi)025:30: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo dang /
NK036(chi)025:33: sngon gyi bla ma rnams kyis lung bstan pa /
NK036(chi)025:34: kyee e ma tshe gcig lus gcig gis sangs rgya
NK036(chi)025:35: ba'i man ngag rdzogs pa chen po gsang ba bla
NK036(chi)025:36: na med pa'i skor brag seng ge dang 'dra ba
NK036(chi)025:37: la yod kyi / de thon la sems can gyi don dpag tu med pa gyis shig /
NK036(chi)025:38: 'phrad chog gi chos ni ngo mtshar e ma //
NK036(chi)025:39: zhes lung bstan te mi snang bar gyur to //
NK036(chi)025:40: dgung lo bco brgyad kyi dus su lung bstan ngo ma shes gsungs /
NK036(chi)025:41: de'i srod la bsam mno btang ba'i rjes la mi zhwa dkar po gyon pa zhig na re /
NK036(chi)025:43: nang par tho rangs kyang byung nas 'dongs gsungs nas phyin pas /
NK036(chi)025:44: nyang smad pa tshab nye ma mdar slebs pa'i nub
NK036(chi)025:45: mo ban d+he mang po tshogs nas ser lha gsol
NK036(chi)025:46: zhing 'dug nas bza' bca' mang po byin pas de'i
NK036(chi)025:47: lo mu ge chen po yod pas dngos grub de
NK036(chi)025:48: la zer ram snyam pa'i nam langs khar 'dongs zer
NK036(chi)025:49: ba la / ban d+he de rnams kyis chang mang
NK036(chi)025:50: po drangs chos gtam yang mang du byas te shes
NK036(chi)025:51: rab dang thos bsam la mgu ba yin skad /
NK036(chi)025:52: de nas nyi ma dros pa la khar la byon nas lam ngo ma shes tsam na /
NK036(chi)025:53: yang dge bsnyen zhwa dkar can gyis sna drangs nas phyin te /
NK036(chi)025:54: stags thabs su slebs pa'i nub mo khang sto zhig tu nyal tsam na /
NK036(chi)025:56: 'dir ma bsdad da lta 'dongs zer tsa na sgor thon ma thag tu khang stong de 'gyel lo //
NK036(chi)025:57: de'i nub char chen po byung nas brang khung zhig
NK036(chi)025:58: tu bsdad pa'i nub mo kho'i sprul pas bza' btung
NK036(chi)025:60: de nas nangs par ra lag tshugs brgal nas 'o
NK036(chi)025:61: yug mda' na mar 'khrug pa yod kyang kho'i sprul
NK036(chi)025:62: pas 'jigs pa med par 'o yug bar brtol ba'i
NK036(chi)025:63: nyin par shin tu bkres pa byung ba la shing
NK036(chi)025:64: thun ma kun gyis bza' btung byin nas byis pas
NK036(chi)025:65: brag seng ge dang 'dra ba'i rtsar slebs pa dang
NK036(chi)025:67: spyan gyis kun tu gzigs kyang ma rnyed /
NK036(chi)025:68: phyir log tu ma btub gnas pa las /
NK036(chi)025:69: kha byang du bltas pas r+ts+wa bzang po skyes pa'i sgo gcig 'dug nas /
NK036(chi)025:70: lag na mtshon rnon cig yod pa de brgyab pas nang du khrol gyi song nas /
NK036(chi)025:71: nang du phyin pas brag phug gi dbus na dkyil
NK036(chi)025:72: 'khor gcig gi dbus na nyi ma shar nas 'dug
NK036(chi)025:73: pa la / mtshon rnon gyis sngogs pas /
NK036(chi)025:74: sbrul dang sbal pa shig shig 'dug nas rim pa
NK036(chi)025:75: bzhin du bsam nas steng du bton te bltas pas
NK036(chi)025:76: thugs la chos ni nga rang mkhas /
NK036(chi)025:77: nor zhig byung na dga' ba la snyam bltas pas /
NK036(chi)025:78: de nas kha byang brgya rtsa brgyad byung nas rab tu dga' nas bro 'khrabs so //
NK036(chi)025:79: de nas 'breng zhags cig gis gril nas lung gi phug gcig tu bltas pas /
NK036(chi)025:80: sa rub nas ma mthong bar yod tsa na /
NK036(chi)025:81: yang dge bsnyen cig gis mar me dang bza' btung khyer nas dpe la blta yin yod tsa na /
NK036(chi)025:82: skad gdangs shin tu 'jigs su rung ba zhig sgo drung du byung ba dang /
NK036(chi)025:83: khos 'a di lung bstan pa'i sprul pa de yin par a lces ma rig /
NK036(chi)025:85: ngas a lce khrid nas 'ong gi zer ba dang /
NK036(chi)025:86: de nas ci zhig tsam na skad shin tu 'jigs pa /
NK036(chi)025:87: phug pa rdib pa snyam byed nas /
NK036(chi)025:88: spyan bteg byas pas sgo drung na mig sla nga
NK036(chi)025:89: tsam yod pa kha khrag tu khol ba gcig mche
NK036(chi)025:90: ba gtsigs shing 'jigs su rung ba zhig 'dug pa
NK036(chi)025:91: dang bred de / 'di dag 'phrad pa ci chen snyam pa dang /
NK036(chi)025:92: yang gong du lung bstan pa a lces ma rig byas pas /
NK036(chi)025:94: nga ni e ka dz+aa ti yin //
NK036(chi)025:95: tshogs 'khor brgya dang rtsa brgyad thong //
NK036(chi)025:96: lo gsum bar du ma bshad cig /
NK036(chi)025:98: dge bsnyen zhwa dkar can de ni dge bsnyen rdo rje legs pa'o //
NK036(chi)025:99: de nas phug pa'i sgo bkag nas /
NK036(chi)025:100: g.yu chung zhig yod pas mi gcig gis /
NK036(chi)025:101: ba'i sha dang nas khal gsum la tshogs brgya rtsa brgyad btang ngo //
NK036(chi)025:102: de nas nyang stod khu yul nas shog bu dang yo byad bsnams nas byon /
NK036(chi)025:103: nyang rtag rjed du shag mo dkar mtsho bya ba
NK036(chi)025:104: yon bdag mo dad pa can zhig gis zhabs tog
NK036(chi)025:105: cher mdzad nas dpe rnams tshang par bris /
NK036(chi)025:106: lo gsum gsang ba ma thub gsungs de nas dgung
NK036(chi)025:107: lo nyi shu rtsa lnga la dbus su byon nas
NK036(chi)025:108: / skyi sgang du gnas chung gcig brtsigs /
NK036(chi)025:109: de nas gtsang du byon nas shag mo dkar mtsho
NK036(chi)025:110: dang 'grogs nas shags dang rta nag nas yar la
NK036(chi)025:111: byon pas der zam kha gcig tu grub thob seng
NK036(chi)025:112: ge dbang phyug dang mjal nas /
NK036(chi)025:113: don sku gsum dbyer med du gtan la phab /
NK036(chi)025:114: chos rnams kyi rjes gnang byin nas mi snang bar gshegs so //
NK036(chi)025:115: de nas dbus su byon bla ma la stod pa
NK036(chi)025:116: la sogs te grub thob mang po dang mjal nas
NK036(chi)025:117: gdams pa ma lus pa'i zhun mthar chod par mdzad
NK036(chi)025:118: do // chags zhen 'khri ba bcad pa la dgongs
NK036(chi)025:119: te yod byad spang dag mdzad cing chos kyi rgya
NK036(chi)025:120: mtsho'i nang nas yid bzhin nor bu gsang ba bla
NK036(chi)025:121: na med pa spyan sngar 'tshogs shing 'dus pa rnam
NK036(chi)025:122: smin cing grol te sangs rgyas par mdzad de /
NK036(chi)025:123: de nas dus skabs shig tu slob dpon gnyer sgom
NK036(chi)025:124: gyis mtshur khungs su gdan drangs pa'i dus su tshogs
NK036(chi)025:125: 'khor mdzad pa'i tho rangs kha bi ma la dang
NK036(chi)025:126: mjal nas byin rlabs dang rjes gnang mdzad de /
NK036(chi)025:127: mkha' la gshegs te mi snang bar gyur to //
NK036(chi)025:128: de'i tshe dgung lo drug cu rtsa gcig bzhes pa yin no //
NK036(chi)025:129: de'i lo la bdag cag gi ma yum dang rten 'brel mdzad nas sgom khang du bzhugs /
NK036(chi)025:132: bdag cag lcam sring gsum 'khrungs nas sgom khang du
NK036(chi)025:133: zhing dang mkhar las la sogs pa ci rigs pa
NK036(chi)025:134: mdzad / de'i dus su bla ma'i zhal nas bdag
NK036(chi)025:135: gis tshogs pa ma bskyangs na phung po lhag med
NK036(chi)025:137: sku lus la grib ma med pa dang /
NK036(chi)025:138: skabs su rigs lngar gsal ba dang /
NK036(chi)025:139: rdzogs pa chen po'i chos gsungs pa'i dus su 'aja'i gur phub pa kun gyis mthong /
NK036(chi)025:140: de'i tshe rang gi bu chen rnams bsdus nas /
NK036(chi)025:141: bla ma gzhung pas dbu mdzad pa'i dge ba'i bshes
NK036(chi)025:142: gnyen rnams la ci bdog pa thams cad 'khor gsum
NK036(chi)025:143: yongs su dag par mdzad do //
NK036(chi)025:144: de nas dgung lo bdun cu don gcig phag gi
NK036(chi)025:145: lo'i lug gi zla ba'i nyi shu gnyis kyi nam
NK036(chi)025:146: phyed na sku gshegs pa'i tshul bstan te /
NK036(chi)025:147: shar phyogs su sgra chen po bdun bsgrags so //
NK036(chi)025:148: sa chen po gsum btud du g.yos so //
NK036(chi)025:149: nam mkha' la sil snyan dang dri zhim gyi ngad du gyur /
NK036(chi)025:151: 'od phub chung tsam ni nam mkha' la gcal du bkram ste /
NK036(chi)025:152: zhang chen po mya ngan las 'das so //
NK036(chi)025:153: de'i phyir nub pur khang brtsigs te pur sbyangs pas sku lnga'i tshab tu ring bsrel lnga byon /
NK036(chi)025:154: sa bcu drug non pa'i rtags su gdung sha r+ai ram bcu drug byon /
NK036(chi)025:156: der 'dus pa'i mi rnams la mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin skyes so //
NK036(chi)025:157: sa chen po la 'khod par byas so //
NK036(chi)025:158: kye ma kyi hud rgyal ba zhang //
NK036(chi)025:160: rjes 'jug mun pa gang gis sel //
NK036(chi)025:161: bla ma khyed kyi thugs rje yis //
NK036(chi)025:162: chu bur mig gi sgo sol la //
NK036(chi)025:163: ye shes sgron ma bstan du gsol //
NK036(chi)025:165: zhang nyi 'bum gyi rnam thar bzhugs /
NK036(chi)025:166: dri med mchog gi brgyud pa bla ma'i sku //
NK036(chi)025:167: sde snod kun gyi mnga' bdag rgyal ba'i sras //
NK036(chi)025:168: ye shes nyi 'od 'gro kun khyab mdzad pa'i //
NK036(chi)025:169: rtsod med bla ma nyid la gus pas 'dud //
NK036(chi)025:170: rtsa ba'i rgyud sgra thal 'gyur las lung bstan pa'i
NK036(chi)025:171: lag na rdo rje'i sprul pa zhang nyi ma 'bum
NK036(chi)025:172: zhes bya ba'i lo rgyus zur tsam ni /
NK036(chi)025:173: yab mtshan brjod par dka' ba rgyal ba zhang ston dang /
NK036(chi)025:174: rgyal mo yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa'i dus su
NK036(chi)025:175: yum gyi rmi lam na nyi ma mang po shar
NK036(chi)025:176: ba rmis nas yab la zhus pas gsang ba bla
NK036(chi)025:177: na med pa 'dis sems can mang po'i don byed
NK036(chi)025:178: pa 'ongs pa'i rtags yin khyod the tshom za mi
NK036(chi)025:179: 'tshal gsungs / g.yang de gnyis kyi sras su 'khrungs
NK036(chi)025:180: te de'i dus su yab kyis mtshan gsol ba sems
NK036(chi)025:181: can kun gyi ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba'i
NK036(chi)025:182: nyi 'od du 'gyur bar 'dug pas nyi ma 'bum
NK036(chi)025:185: de nas dgung lo gsum song tsa na khong rang
NK036(chi)025:186: gis so pho rgya ston lung gro ba'i phur pa
NK036(chi)025:187: dang / yang dag gi sgrub pa mang du mdzad de /
NK036(chi)025:188: byin gyis brlabs shing bar chad bsal lo //
NK036(chi)025:189: dgung lo lnga nas bdun brgyad kyi bar la yab
NK036(chi)025:190: nyid kyi gsang ba bla na med pa'i dbang gdams
NK036(chi)025:192: rgyud bcu bdun gyi lung rdzogs par mdzad do //
NK036(chi)025:193: dgung lo dgu la bla ma nyid sku 'das /
NK036(chi)025:194: de'i dus su 'gro mgon zhang g.yu grags pa gdan drangs nas /
NK036(chi)025:195: bka' rgyas 'bring rnam gsum phyag tu btang ste tshig gis phul zhing sa bde 'jam la bkod do //
NK036(chi)025:196: dgung lo bcu nas bco lnga man chad la rtsa ba'i rgyud sgra thal 'gyur dang /
NK036(chi)025:197: rgyud bcu bdun gyi bshad pa tshar bar mdzad do //
NK036(chi)025:198: che sar ston dus su bu slob rnams legs par bsdus te /
NK036(chi)025:199: rgyud gdams ngag dang bcas pa bshad pas bu slob kun ngo mtshar skyes shing dad par gyur /
NK036(chi)025:200: bco brgyad la slob dpon gyi spyan sngar dbang gong ma zhus /
NK036(chi)025:201: dgung lo nyi shu tham pa la bla ma rngog rgyal tsha rdor seng gi spyan sngar byon te /
NK036(chi)025:202: sngags gsar ma'i rgyud gdams ngag dang bcas pa zhus /
NK036(chi)025:203: dgung lo nyi shu rtsa gnyis la jo mo rgya gar khab tu bzhes /
NK036(chi)025:204: dgung lo nyi shu rtsa bdun la sa skya'i 'khon grags pa rgyal mtshan dang /
NK036(chi)025:205: bla ma stag so ba'i spyan sngar byon te /
NK036(chi)025:206: rgyud gsum man ngag dang bcas pa dang /
NK036(chi)025:207: bde mchog mal gyi lugs zhus /
NK036(chi)025:208: nyi shu rtsa dgu la jo mo ser rgyan khab tu bzhes /
NK036(chi)025:209: dgung lo sum cu la kha rag bon drug gi bla ma skyi ston grags pa'i spyan sngar byon /
NK036(chi)025:210: bde mchog lhan skyes a phyi'i lugs dang /
NK036(chi)025:211: rje btsun ma rwa lugs dang /
NK036(chi)025:212: mgon po bya rog ma dang tshal ba'i chos skor zhus /
NK036(chi)025:213: lar ni mkhas shing grub pa thob pa'i bla ma
NK036(chi)025:214: mang du bsten cing gdams ngag mang du zhus te
NK036(chi)025:215: thugs dgongs lon par mdzad do //
NK036(chi)025:216: rgyud kyi bshad pa dang gdams ngag gi khrid la
NK036(chi)025:217: sogs pa'ang mang du mdzad de thams cad smin cing
NK036(chi)025:219: de nas dgung lo lnga bcu nga drug la cho
NK036(chi)025:220: 'phrul chen po'i zla ba'i tshes brgyad la sku 'das
NK036(chi)025:221: pa'i tshul bstan te pur la bkod de /
NK036(chi)025:222: gdung sha r+ai ram dang chu r+ai ram dang /
NK036(chi)025:223: pany+tsa ram la sogs pa kha dog ma 'dres pa
NK036(chi)025:224: lnga byon te bla ma nyi 'bum chen po dbyings
NK036(chi)025:225: su yal lo // kye ma kyi hud nyi ma'i mtshan can rin po che //
NK036(chi)025:226: rigs drug 'khor ba'i mun pa'i smag rum du //
NK036(chi)025:227: gsal dag ye shes spyan gyis gzigs pa las //
NK036(chi)025:228: lnga ldan 'od kyi sgron me yis //
NK036(chi)025:230: skad cig nyid la gsal bar mdzad //
NK036(chi)025:232: chos bdag gu ru jo 'ber gyi rnam thar bzhugs /
NK036(chi)025:233: sprin bral nam mkha'i klong nas thugs rje'i nyi ma shar //
NK036(chi)025:234: ma rig rmongs pa'i ling thog kun bsal nas //
NK036(chi)025:235: rtags chad gnyis med ngang nas rig pa 'od du 'bar //
NK036(chi)025:236: skal ldan sangs rgyas sa la tshe 'di nyid la bkod //
NK036(chi)025:237: chos bdag gu ru nyid la gus pas bstod //
NK036(chi)025:238: de la chos bdag gu ru jo 'ber gyi rnam thar mdo tsam 'adi'o //
NK036(chi)025:239: de la yab ni bla ma mkhas pa nyi 'bum gyi gcung po zla ba 'bum dang /
NK036(chi)025:240: yum rgyal mo a lu gnyis kyi sras su 'khrungs te /
NK036(chi)025:241: dgung lo bdun man chod lkugs pa dang 'dra ba zhig yod /
NK036(chi)025:242: bdun nas shes rab thogs med du ral te ci la yang thogs rdug med pa zhig byung /
NK036(chi)025:243: dgung lo brgyad nas bco brgyad kyi bar la a
NK036(chi)025:244: khu drin chen zhang nyi 'bum las gsang ba bla
NK036(chi)025:245: med kyi dbang gdams ngag dang bcas pa dang /
NK036(chi)025:246: rgyud rnams ma lus pa tshar bar gsan nas sgra thal 'gyur gyi bshad pa byas /
NK036(chi)025:247: dgung lo bcu dgu nas nyi shu'i bar la chos
NK036(chi)025:248: rje sa skya lo ts+tsha ba la rgyud gsum gdams
NK036(chi)025:250: bde mchog mal gyo lugs gsan /
NK036(chi)025:251: de nas dge bshes chu mig pa las tshad ma btus pa gsan /
NK036(chi)025:252: dgung lo nyi shu rtsa gnyis la bla ma khro
NK036(chi)025:253: phu pa las grub thob mi tra dz+wa ki'i gdams
NK036(chi)025:254: pa rnams gsan / bal po grags pa 'bum me
NK036(chi)025:255: las phyag rgya chen po kha 'thor gyi gdams pa
NK036(chi)025:256: pa rnams gsan / gsan / lar ni thos bsam
NK036(chi)025:257: gyi las tshar zhing thugs thag chod pa dgung lo
NK036(chi)025:258: sum cu so drug gi bar la mdzad do //
NK036(chi)025:259: chos 'brel tsam gyi bla ma jo bo bzang zhing
NK036(chi)025:260: chos la mkhas pa mang po brten pa lags so
NK036(chi)025:261: // lha'i zhal gyi rnam pa la lha'i thang sku
NK036(chi)025:262: 'di kun dang lder tsho dang rag sku mang po
NK036(chi)025:263: mthong gsungs nas zhal du gsungs /
NK036(chi)025:264: 'on kyang gsal bar gsungs pa la /
NK036(chi)025:265: lha sa ru jo bo la mar me 'bul du phyin nas gsol ba btab pas /
NK036(chi)025:266: jo bo'i zhal nas 'ja' tshon sna lngas bskor nas
NK036(chi)025:267: 'dug pa de'i gseb nas phar la thig le bzhi
NK036(chi)025:268: lnga tsam gyi nang na phyag na rdo rje yab
NK036(chi)025:269: yum dang thugs rje chen po'i zhal mthong /
NK036(chi)025:270: yang lan gcig tho rangs kha la mgon po tshe
NK036(chi)025:271: dpag tu med pa zhig 'ja' tshon dang thig le
NK036(chi)025:272: shig shig pa zhig zhal mthong /
NK036(chi)025:273: de'i yo na tan yin pa 'dra /
NK036(chi)025:274: nged kyang tshe ring rgyud kho na'ang min te /
NK036(chi)025:276: de min rang byung sgron ma 'od gsal gyi dang yin mod /
NK036(chi)025:277: nged rang pha spad tshos 'di 'dra ba yod pas 'tshe ba med gsungs nas /
NK036(chi)025:278: sku 'gyur med bde chen gyi ngang la bzhugs /
NK036(chi)025:279: gsung 'gags med nges don gyi chos gsungs /
NK036(chi)025:280: thugs gsal stong mtha' bral du blo bade'o //
NK036(chi)025:281: yos lo ston zla ra ba'i nya la sku gshegs te /
NK036(chi)025:283: ring bsrel dang +aahmh'u la sogs pa byon no //
NK036(chi)025:284: e ma ngo mtshar rmad du che zhing dar rgyas chos //
NK036(chi)025:285: rigs drug dag tu skye bar rgyun bcad mi tshe 'dir //
NK036(chi)025:286: 'khor 'das gnyis kyi re dogs bral bar skad cig mas //
NK036(chi)025:287: nges don mchog gi brgyud 'dzin gu ru rin po che //
NK036(chi)025:288: mnga' bdag chen po'i khyod kyis ye shes snang ba ston //
